caption: This photograph depicts a rural scene featuring a dirt road leading towards a mound of earth that blocks further passage. The road is flanked by lush greenery, including trees and bushes under a clear blue sky. On the right side of the barrier, there's a sign that reads "ROAD CLOSED" and another that says "PRIVATE PROPERTY, KEEP OUT." These signs are mounted on a wooden post on the right side of the road. The surrounding area is tranquil and appears to be in a natural, possibly forested area with no visible buildings or people. The composition of the photo highlights the obstruction in what would otherwise be a passable road, emphasizing themes of restriction or private land.
title: Road closed by the hanna coal company because of nearby strip mining off route #800 near Barnesville, Ohio
